post.author: Admin
post.title: Cleaning Out Your Closets for Easter Seals
post.description: Well, the nice weather is upon us and it is time to start thinking about changing the closets for su
post.content:
Well, the nice weather is upon us and it is time to start thinking about changing the closets for summer! What a perfect time since the NRBB ‘Fill the Truck’ for Easter Seals event is Saturday, April 23 from 9-6 by the Board of Education.

So please help the marching band and Easter Seals by pulling the small, worn, torn cloth items (ANY cloth items) and bring them to the collection on Saturday, April 23rd!

Here is a great article about the event. Share it with your friends and family and ask them to donate too!

We also still have a few shifts available to volunteers. If you would like to help, click here and sign up.

As always, thanks for all you do!
